Entries.Description: Fixed issue in the Create/Edit Profile dialog box where importing from a CSV file would not update the UI.
Lambda Test tool is now set up when Visual Studio launches and immediately loads a solution
The Toolkit's User Guide can now be accessed from the "AWS Toolkit" menu, located in the "Extensions" menu ("Tools" menu in Visual Studio 2017)
Added a menu item to report a bug or make a feature request, available from the "AWS Toolkit" menu, located in the "Extensions" menu ("Tools" menu in Visual Studio 2017)
